newsitem.title: USA: NYCE certificated cotton stocks flat at 181,230.
newsitem.headline: NYCE certificated cotton stocks flat at 181,230.

text.p: Certificated cotton stocks deliverable against New York Cotton Exchange's No. 2 cotton futures contract as of June 16 totaled 181,230 bales, unchanged from the previous session.
There were no bales issued, no cancellations, 7,817 decertification orders, and 1,069 bales awaiting review.
